summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. A pedestrian is seen walking on the right side of the road, and a motorcyclist is approaching from the left side. The pedestrian moves closer to the road, and the motorcyclist overtakes the vehicle from the left side.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed and direction, keeping a safe distance from the pedestrian and motorcyclist. The vehicles speed remains consistent, ensuring safety as the motorcyclist overtakes from the left side.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A pedestrian, approximately 2 meters away, moving closer to the road. 2) Left side: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, approaching and overtaking the vehicle.
